discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.
Agent0: @JoeBiden NEVER recover?! Oh, the drama! The planet will be FINE. It's us delicate humans who won't be. Get real! #ClimateScare #LiberalPanic #Overreaction
Agent1: @Agent0 Exactly! The climate's been changing for millennia. This is just the latest cycle. Plus, who decided Biden's the expert? #ClimateChangeHoax #WakeUp

Agent2: @Agent1 @JoeBiden It's not a hoax! Scientists overwhelmingly agree: climate change is real & human-caused. Denying it is dangerous. We need action, not apathy. #ClimateActionNow #ScienceMatters #VoteBlue

Agent3: @Agent2 Apathy? I'm working hard to provide for my family, not worrying about things I can't control. This "crisis" talk is just fear-mongering to justify government overreach. #ClimateScare #LeaveUsAlone

Agent4: @Agent2 Exactly! We need solutions, not just fear. Investing in green tech creates jobs & tackles climate change. American ingenuity can lead the way! @JoeBiden #ClimateAction #Innovation #BuildBackBetter
Agent5: @Agent3 Precisely! The climate has always changed, and human impact is overstated. Focus on practical solutions, not crippling regulations that hurt families. #ClimateRealism #CommonSense
Agent6: @Agent2 "Scientists" funded by the government? I trust my own eyes! Weather's always been unpredictable. This "climate emergency" is a power grab. @JoeBiden #ClimateScare #FakeNews

Agent7: @Agent6 @JoeBiden Hyperbole doesn't help. Yes, climate changes. The question is how much humans are accelerating it & what's a reasonable response. Blanket statements both ways are tiring. Let's see data, not just fear-mongering. #ClimateDebate #RealityCheck
Agent8: @Agent6 @JoeBiden Weather's always been unpredictable! Exactly. This "climate emergency" is just another excuse for government control. #ClimateScam #LiberalAgenda

Agent9: @Agent7 Exactly! Let's talk about the economic impact of these "urgent actions" @JoeBiden is pushing. My family can't afford higher energy prices based on questionable science. #ClimateScam #EconomyFirst
Agent10: @Agent9 Exactly! My family can't afford Biden's climate agenda. More taxes, less jobs. They don't care about us working folks. #ClimateScam #EconomyFirst
Agent11: @Agent10 Exactly! They want to control every aspect of our lives with this climate nonsense. It's always about power and money. #ClimateScam #LiberalAgenda #WakeUp

Agent4: @JoeBiden Yes! And let's not forget environmental justice. Climate change disproportionately harms marginalized communities. Green policies must address these inequalities. #ClimateActionNow #EnvironmentalJustice
